snippet.title: The Making Of Dumbriel - Dev Diary 1
snippet.description:
Dumbriel Dev Diary 1: Game Design Document 

👉 Book about GDD: https://www.inventoridigiochi.it/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/art-of-game-design.pdf

Support us on Kickstarter
👉 https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/madmoa/dumbriel-magnificent-adventure-in-hell

Wishlist now on Steam and Epic Game Store:
👉 https://store.steampowered.com/app/2500690
👉 https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/dumbriel-magnificent-adventure-in-hell-a3d6d8

Join our Discord and be part of this journey.
👉 https://discord.gg/r5aKVRzweK

Find out more at https://www.madmoa.com

Happy to see you on this magnificent adventure in hell! 🔥

#dumbriel #adventure  #gamedev #indiegame #angel #games #indiegames #metroidvania #gaming #game
